  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Katera je maksimalna  hitrost viseče uteži?</string>
            <string language="en">What is the maximum speed of the hanging mass?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist die Höchstgeschwindigkeit der hängenden 
Masse?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est la vitesse maximum de la masse 
s'arrêtante ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que está a uma velocidade máxima da massa de 
suspensão?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è la velocità massima della massa 
appendente?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια είναι η μέγιστη ταχύτητα της κρεμώντας μάζας;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es la velocidad máxima de la masa que 
cuelga?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Določi maksimalno hitrost nihanja glede na krožno gibanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Determine the maximal speed of oscillation with regard to circular motion.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nihanje</string>
            <string language="en">oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">krožno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">periodično gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">periodic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie die maximale Geschwindigkeit der 
Pendelbewegung hinsichtlich der kreisförmigen Bewegung fest.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminez la vitesse maximale de l'oscillation en ce qui
concerne le mouvement circulaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determine a velocidade máxima da oscilação no que diz 
respeito ao movimento circular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determini la velocità massima di oscillazione riguardo a 
movimento circolare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορίστε τη μέγιστη ταχύτητα της ταλάντωσης όσον 
αφορά την κυκλική κίνηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determine la velocidad máxima de la oscilación con 
respecto al movimiento circular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendelbewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oscillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oscilação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">oscillazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento circolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ταλάντωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oscilación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento circular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
